Publications

2024

  1. Khan, H., Rahman, M.S., Ahmed, S.K. and Hossain, T. (2024). Molecular characterization of antibiotic resistance genes in Escherichia coli isolates from Dhaka, Bangladesh. Journal of Antimicrobial Chemotherapy, 79(3), 456-467.
    https://doi.org/10.1093/jac/dkab123
  2. Islam, R., Khan, H. and Begum, A. (2024). CRISPR-Cas9 mediated gene editing in rice for enhanced drought tolerance. Plant Biotechnology Journal, 22(8), 1823-1835.
    https://doi.org/10.1111/pbi.14089

2023

  1. Ahmed, S.K., Rahman, T. and Khan, H. (2023). Proteomic analysis of heat shock response in Bacillus subtilis under extreme temperatures. Proteomics, 23(12), 2200445.
    https://doi.org/10.1002/pmic.202200445
  2. Hossain, M.T., Khan, H., Islam, S. and Akter, F. (2023). Genetic diversity and phylogenetic analysis of indigenous rice varieties in Bangladesh. BMC Genomics, 24(1), 287.
    https://doi.org/10.1186/s12864-023-09387-2
  3. Begum, A., Islam, R. and Khan, H. (2023). Identification of novel biomarkers for early detection of colorectal cancer in Bangladeshi population. Cancer Biomarkers, 36(2), 189-201.
    https://doi.org/10.3233/CBM-220156

2022

  1. Khan, H. and Rahman, M.S. (2022). Structural and functional characterization of a novel thermostable lipase from Geobacillus sp.. Enzyme and Microbial Technology, 160, 110089.
    https://doi.org/10.1016/j.enzmictec.2022.110089
  2. Rahman, T., Ahmed, S.K., Hossain, M.T. and Khan, H. (2022). Metagenomics analysis reveals microbial diversity in arsenic-contaminated groundwater of Bangladesh. Environmental Microbiology, 24(9), 4123-4139.
    https://doi.org/10.1111/1462-2920.16045
  3. Islam, S., Khan, H. and Begum, A. (2022). Expression profiling of microRNAs in hepatocellular carcinoma: potential diagnostic and prognostic markers. Molecular Biology Reports, 49(7), 6543-6554.
    https://doi.org/10.1007/s11033-022-07489-3
